Name: Loading Story
About the game: Loading Story is an extremely short (10-20 mins) narrative adventure game about loading. You play as Memu@, a young software who's just doing her best to keep her job. As she explores the cyberpunk(ish) little town and interacts with its inhabitants. Features? Features. Meet and talk with the town's citizens Play some out of place and forced minigames Walk around just like in any other games
